de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.route

Interface ImMessageRouter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultImMessageRouter

    public interface ImMessageRouter
    Generic message router to find interested IM(C/V) for a message of a component type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addExclusiveId(Long primaryId, long additionalId)
      Adds an additional ID for an IM(C/V) with the given primary ID to the route table for exclusive delivery.
      Long findExclRecipientId(Long recipientId, long vendorId, long messageType)
      Finds an IM(C/V) recipient with the given primary/additional ID for a message type described by the given vendor ID and message type ID in the route table.
      Set<Long> findRecipientIds(long vendorId, long messageType)
      Finds a set of IM(C/V) recipients for a message type described by the given vendor ID and message type ID in the route table.
      void remove(Long primaryId)
      Removes the IM(C/V) with the given primary ID and its message type entries from the table.
      void updateMap(Long primaryId, Set<de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.SupportedMessageType> types)
      Updates the route table for the IM(C/V) with the given primary ID using the given set of supported message types.

    • Method Detail

      • updateMap

        void updateMap(Long primaryId,
             Set<de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.SupportedMessageType> types)
        Updates the route table for the IM(C/V) with the given primary ID using the given set of supported message types.
        Parameters:
        primaryId - the IM(C/V) ID
        types - the set of supported messages types

      • remove

        void remove(Long primaryId)
        Removes the IM(C/V) with the given primary ID and its message type entries from the table.
        Parameters:
        primaryId - the IM(C/V) ID

      • addExclusiveId

        void addExclusiveId(Long primaryId,
                  long additionalId)
        Adds an additional ID for an IM(C/V) with the given primary ID to the route table for exclusive delivery.
        Parameters:
        primaryId - the IM(C/V) ID
        additionalId - the additional IM(C/V) ID

      • findRecipientIds

        Set<Long> findRecipientIds(long vendorId,
                         long messageType)
                           throws NoRecipientFoundException
        Finds a set of IM(C/V) recipients for a message type described by the given vendor ID and message type ID in the route table. (multicast routing)
        Parameters:
        vendorId - the message type vendor ID
        messageType - the message type ID
        Returns:
        a set of recipients
        Throws:
        NoRecipientFoundException - if no recipient was found

      • findExclRecipientId

        Long findExclRecipientId(Long recipientId,
                       long vendorId,
                       long messageType)
                         throws NoRecipientFoundException
        Finds an IM(C/V) recipient with the given primary/additional ID for a message type described by the given vendor ID and message type ID in the route table. (unicast routing)
        Parameters:
        recipientId - the recipients primary/additional ID
        vendorId - the message type vendor ID
        messageType - the message type ID
        Returns:
        the recipients primary ID
        Throws:
        NoRecipientFoundException - if no recipient was found
